.. _class_AudioStreamPlayer3D:

å®Œå…¨å¬ä¸åˆ°å£°éŸ³çš„è·ç¦»ã€‚ä»…å½“è®¾ç½®ä¸ºå¤§äº ``0.0`` çš„å€¼æ—¶æ‰æœ‰æ•ˆã€‚\ :ref:`max_distance<class_AudioStreamPlayer3D_property_max_distance>` ä¸ :ref:`unit_size<class_AudioStreamPlayer3D_property_unit_size>` ååŒå·¥ä½œã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œä¸ :ref:`unit_size<class_AudioStreamPlayer3D_property_unit_size>` çš„è¡Œä¸ºå–å†³äº :ref:`attenuation_model<class_AudioStreamPlayer3D_property_attenuation_model>` ä¸åŒï¼Œ\ :ref:`max_distance<class_AudioStreamPlayer3D_property_max_distance>` å§‹ç»ˆä»¥çº¿æ€§æ–¹å¼å·¥ä½œã€‚è¿™å¯ç”¨äºé˜²æ­¢ **AudioStreamPlayer3D** åœ¨å¬è€…è¾ƒè¿œæ—¶éœ€è¦æ··éŸ³ï¼Œä»è€ŒèŠ‚çœ CPU èµ„æºã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-property

- |void| **set_playback_type**\ (\ value\: :ref:`PlaybackType<enum_AudioServer_PlaybackType>`\ )
- :ref:`PlaybackType<enum_AudioServer_PlaybackType>` **get_playback_type**\ (\ )

**å®éªŒæ€§ï¼š** æœªæ¥ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸­å¯èƒ½ä¿®æ”¹æˆ–ç§»é™¤è¯¥å±æ€§ã€‚

The playback type of the stream player. If set other than to the default value, it will force that playback type.
